ext_description.p: A Font_definition is the definition of a font. Font support shall include outlines using glyphs, as well as font and font family.
ext_description.note: This description is intended to be a complete reference to a font definition. Items to be included are usually font size, aspect ratio, type, etc.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Registered_font is a font that is registered by an organization and defined within a document. Support shall be provided for font character representation using outline glyphs and font family exchange.
